unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi remains crucial. We aim to recruit top talent like Priya Sharma. Our current drive focuses on fresh graduates for roles in Bangalore and Mumbai. Remuneration starts at Rs. 8 Lakhs per annum. We seek candidates with the "3 Idiots" spirit - innovative and driven. Further details will be shared by Nov 15th.
